A mụrụ Jamwa na mpaghara Tororo
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Social Works and Social Administration (SWASA)
O nwetakwara diplọma post-graduate na Masters na Public Administration na Mahadum Arkansas.

N'afọ 1994, Jamwa nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na ntuli aka nke Constituent Assembly iji nọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Tororo dị ka onye nnọchi anya Constituent Assembly (CAD). Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa a n'agbata na afọ 1994  na afọ  1995 mgbe obere oge gachara, ọ gbara ọsọ maka onye omeiwu maka West Budama ọ meriri Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ n'oge ahụ, Henry Obbo na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2001.
N'afọ 1994, Jamwa na Winnie Byanyima, Esther Dhugira Opoti, Benigna Mukiibi, Solome Mukisa na Betty Akech Okullo guzobere Forum for Women in Democracy (FOWODE), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị.

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo (RDC) maka mpaghara Kaberamaido, ọkwá ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na afọ 2005 iji ruo eru maka ntuli aka nke Uganda n'afọ 2006. Otú ọ dị, na afọ 2012, a kọrọ na ọ nwere oge na-agba ọsọ na Tororo District Service Commission. Ọ ka nọ n'otu ọkwa ahụ na afọ 2015 mgbe ọ na-azọ " osote onye isi oche nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) Women's League na-anọchite anya mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ.
